Welcome to Patient Prize!

Let's get started...


home
Dashboard

Our easy to navigate dashboard makes it simple to find your CareMessenger reminders, see how many points you have earned, and identify your achievements

notifications
Wellness Wall

The wellness wall is where you can review your CareMessenger reminders. These reminders will help you stay healthy and you will earn points for completing them!

shopping_cart
Redeem

Redeem the points you have earned in Patient Prize to collect your reward. Prizes include a $100 Whole Foods gift card, Nike athletic shoes, and family water park passes.
